input: text: "Photography captures moments in time. It is both an art and a science. Digital cameras offer versatility."
output:
Photography captures moments in time. It is both an art and a science.

Digital cameras offer versatility.

Photography captures moments in time. It is both an art and a science.

Digital cameras allow for greater accuracy and ease of use compared to traditional film photography.

A variety of lenses are available for digital cameras, enabling photographers to shoot in different lighting conditions and styles. a technical aspect of camera design is also an important factor that affects the overall quality of images.
